sentences.en: A cold is an infection of the upper respiratory tract.
sentences.cn: 感冒是上呼吸道的感染。

sentences.en: Always sterilize the needle to prevent infection.
sentences.cn: 注射针头每次都要消毒，以防感染。

sentences.en: Antibiotics should be used to clear up the infection.
sentences.cn: 应该用抗生素消除感染。

sentences.en: Athlete's foot is a fungal infection.
Infection with head lice is no reflection on personal hygiene.
sentences.cn: 头上生虱子并不说明不讲个人卫生。

sentences.en: Lili had a nasty chest infection.
Our doctor diagnosed a throat infection and prescribed antibiotic and junior aspirin.
sentences.cn: 我们的医生诊断是喉部感染，并且开了一些抗生素和小剂量阿司匹林。

sentences.en: She was on antibiotics for an eye infection that wouldn't go away.
sentences.cn: 由于眼睛感染一直不见好，她在服用抗生素。

sentences.en: Taking long-term courses of certain medicines may increase vulnerability to infection.
sentences.cn: 长期服用某类药品可能会增加感染的可能性。

sentences.en: The baby had an ear infection.
The likelihood of infection is minimal.
There is lowered pain tolerance, lowered resistance to infection.
sentences.cn: 对疼痛的忍耐力降低了，对感染的抵抗力也减弱了。

sentences.en: There was no danger of transmitting the infection through operations.
sentences.cn: 不存在通过手术传播这种传染病的风险。

sentences.en: There's a time lag between infection with HIV and developing AIDS.
sentences.cn: 从感染艾滋病病毒到病发有一段滞后期。

sentences.en: They've picked up a really nasty infection from something they've eaten.
sentences.cn: 他们因吃错东西而得了很严重的感染症。
暴露于易受感染的环境
